## Installation

You can install the development version of `datacleanr`  with:

``` r
remotes::install_github("the-hull/datacleanr")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(datacleanr)
dcr_app(iris)
## basic example code
```
